name: I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero Tokyo
name_original: I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero Tokyo
description:
Let's challenge traffic control of the sky!
On this “Tokyo” edition, the player can try both the old three- runway version and the new four-runway version of the airport. There are 16 stages that are very enjoyable.
Also, there is a replay mode so that the player can watch his/her operation whenever.

Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 640KB

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
